mapper.insert: insert into share (m_Email,p_Num,c_Code,s_Sdate,s_Pdate) values (#{shareDto.m_Email},#{p_Num},#{c_Code},NOW(),DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL #{rent_hour} HOUR))
mapper.select: select c.c_Code,c.c_Move,s.s_Pdate from cycle c join share s on c.c_Code = s.c_Code where s.m_Email = #{m_Email} and s_Edate is null
mapper.update: update share set s_Edate = NOW() where m_Email = #{shareDto.m_Email} and c_Code = #{c_Code} and s_Edate is null
